title: Did John McCain set fire to the USS Forstal, which killed 134 people?
subtitle: There is a false story that blames the shooting of the carrier in 1967 for the negligence of the pilot who was then carrying the Navy and American Senator John McCain in the future.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A catastrophic fire on USS Forest in 1967 killed 134 sailors and injured 161 for reckless conduct by the Navy pilot John McCain.
